text: The Pontiac 6000 is an American mid-size car produced by Pontiac of General Motors from 1982 to 1991. The 6000 is similar to the Buick Century, Chevrolet Celebrity and Oldsmobile Cutlass Ciera. It only lasted in one generation. Category:1980s automobiles Category:1990s automobiles Category:Coupes Category:Sedans Category:Pontiac automobiles
title: Pontiac 6000
